# Civilian Rifle and Light Remote Switch Assembly Standing Offer Solicitation

## Solicitation Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to submit a standing offer for the supply and delivery of:

* Surefire Light Remote Switch Assemblies
* Surefire Lights (M600U-Z68-BK)

## Objective
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires a no-substitute standing offer for the above-mentioned items on an as-requested basis to its Armourer Sections in Regina, Saskatchewan.

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Reference Number**: WS4552458098-Doc4610488367
* **Publishing Date**: May 30, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: June 19, 2024, 14:00 EST
* **Contract Award Date**: July 17, 2024
* **Contract End Date**: May 31, 2029

## Documents Required
Contractors must submit all required supporting documentation to PSPC by the closing date and time mentioned above. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

## Selection Criteria
Award will be based on the lowest price submitted by a compliant bidder.

## Trade Agreements
This solicitation allows for bids from contractors that are eligible under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

## Contact Information

For more information about this solicitation, please contact Micah Zacharias at:
